title: WTB:  Looking for Speaker Tolstoi, Sov or Amer Beauty?  Young Portrait EPDG or OM?
author: bounce

posts.post_title: WTB:  Looking for Speaker Tolstoi, Sov or Amer Beauty?  Young Portrait EPDG or OM?
posts.post_content:
Looking for nice mid-grade examples of:
Tris Speaker - Tolstoi, Sovereign or American Beauty.  Might even look at a Polar Bear;  would certainly consider any other tough backs but focused on these for now
Cy Young Portrait - Any EPDG or Old Mill

I will pay going rates, not looking for deals/steals - looking for something that will go into my PC.

Also have some nice cards to trade if you'd rather do that, so hit me up.

If you've got something available, let me know.

PM or email to [url]david@davidratliff.com[/url]

Thanks in advance

found a speaker sovereign

bump to find another deal out there
still searching for the next one...let me know
still looking for new speakers or youngs - let me know

looking to add another speaker and/or cy portrait back to my PC

let me know what you have
anyone got one of these they'd consider parting with?

sending this around again

would like to add another speaker and young to the PC

let me know what you've got
